Title: Wild Orchid
Actors: Mickey Rourke, Jacqueline Bisset, Carré Otis, Assumpta Serna
Plot: Emily, a raw recruit to a law firm is sent to Brazil with Claudia to help finalise a real estate deal. Emily is innocent and vulnerable, and when she's left in Rio with Wheeler, a milionaire with an unusual outlook on life, Emily is shocked and intrigued by the sex antics to which she is exposed.
